content: for hat without cuff or 11 for hat with cuff decrease rounds row 1 *k2 p2tog repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 68 sts row 2 *p2 k1 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 row 3 *k2tog p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2tog 45 sts row 4 *p1 k1 repeat from * to last st p1 row 5 k2tog across row to last st k1 23 sts row 6 purl break yarn leaving a 18 tail thread tail through remaining sts and pull tightly secure to keep crown tight seam down hat using one stitch from each side as seam allowance weave in all ends copyright 2010 all rights reserved lynn anne banks this pattern is provided for your personal non-commercial use don t sell hats from this pattern at the farmers market and may not be resold please do share it though and encourage others to knit for charity questions problems email nonsuchknits@gmail com + + nonsuch knits 2555 s 177th plaza #168 omaha ne 68130 2
